.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchResultCollection extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class SearchResultCollection Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements ICollection, IDisposable
public ref class SearchResultCollection : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 该 类包含在 查询过程中由 Active Directory 层次结构返回的 实例。

span.span: The class contains the instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于实现限制类不能在垃圾回收时释放所有非托管资源。Due to implementation restrictions, the class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected. 若要防止内存泄漏，你必须调用方法时不再需要对象。To prevent a memory leak, you must call the method when the object is no longer needed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，它允许通过使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。The method, it allows the resources that are used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). 垃圾回收器不会释放内存对象。The garbage collector does not release memory for a object. 因此，应用程序必须调用方法显式以防止内存泄漏。Therefore, an application must call the method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用与`disposing`参数设置为`false`。 invokes with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的所有资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 垃圾回收器不会释放内存对象。The garbage collector does not release memory for a object. 因此，必须调用方法显式以防止内存泄漏。Therefore, you must call the method explicitly to prevent a memory leak. 此方法调用集合中每个对象的方法。This method invokes the method of each object in the collection. 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

para.span: 方法可以由其他对象调用多次。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写方法请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象方法。

span.span: When overriding the method be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to the method.

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

summary.span: 获取由执行实际搜索的 [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) 方法返回的句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle that is returned by the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method that performs the actual search.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) 上 MSDN Library 中的主题 [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp)。

span.span: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

value.span: 此集合使用的 ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE 值。

span.span: The ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE value that this collection uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，创建此集合调用[IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp)方法，从而使查询结果可用于 T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection 对象。The that created this collection calls the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method, which makes the query results available to the T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp)在 MSDN 库中的主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). 执行查询，则每次该查询的结果的句柄与关联其对象。Each time that a query is performed, a handle for the results of that query is associated with its object. 此句柄对应于 ADSI 中的搜索句柄。This handle corresponds to the search handle in ADSI. 此句柄仍然存在，直到你调用方法对象，因此您必须调用以防止内存泄漏。This handle persists until you call the method on the object, so you must call to prevent a memory leak. 垃圾回收器不会释放此特定对象的内存。The garbage collector does not free memory for this particular object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，此属性是 类的索引器。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript 中，你可以使用默认索引属性定义的类型，但不是能显式定义你自己。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 但是，指定 expando 特性的类上自动提供了默认索引的属性的类型是对象的索引类型的与。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and with an index type of .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 中的大多数集合类命名空间还实现提供同步的包装基础集合已同步方法。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于其基础存储区不公用的集合，预期的实现是返回当前实例。For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 请注意，指向当前实例的指针可能还不够对于包装了其他集合; 的集合这些集合应返回基础集合`SyncRoot`属性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property. 命名空间中的大多数集合类也实现 `Synchronized` 方法，该方法对基础集合提供同步的包装。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 不过，派生类可使用 属性来提供各自的同步版本的集合。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作不是直接对集合的集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可与可能同时对集合实例进行修改的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 在缺少`Synchronized`方法对集合，预期使用情况如下所示：In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for looks like this: ```csharp ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
